DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy toxicity amrubicin carboplatin plus etoposide elderly patient extensive-disease small-cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Amrubicin Study Elderly Patients With Extensive-disease Small-cell Lung Cancer ( ED-SCLC )
DOC.criteria: Extensivedisease smallcell lung cancer Aged 70 year old Performance status 02 No prior chemotherapy Prior therapy primary lesion Pneumonitis and/or pulmonary fibrosis Active concomitant malignancy
